title: Please help (McVitie's font)
content:
Hello everyone!  
Could you please help me identifying this font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804134645im_/http:/typophile.com/files/mcvities_IT-01_6177.jpg)
  
It seems to be somewhat similar to Cronos pro Italic, but it has some Serif features.  
Thank you in advance!

Rael
author: Rael
